entry.title: NealST/VineNote: A lightweight, cross-platform and high performance app for bringing users outstanding experience in writing and reading
entry.content: A lightweight, cross-platform and high performance app for bringing users outstanding experience in writing and reading

entry.title: kohunglee/areaEditor: A lightweight (<2kb) web-based code editor using JavaScript to enhance <textarea> with smart indentation & bracket pairing for smoother coding. areaEditor.js 是个根据 JavaScript 里几个关于操纵 HTML 原生文本编辑框元素 <textarea> API 而开发的增强版 <textarea> 运行库（迷你版代码编辑器）。它只有不到 2kb 大小，但它能大大增强您在编辑代码时的体验。(MIT License)
entry.content: A lightweight (<2kb) web-based code editor using JavaScript to enhance <textarea> with smart indentation & bracket pairing for smoother coding. areaEditor.js 是个根据 JavaScript 里几个关于操纵 HTML 原生文本编辑框元素 <textarea> API 而开发的增强版 <textarea> 运行库（迷你版代码编辑器）。它只有不到 2kb 大小，但它能大大增强您在编辑代码时的体验。(MIT License)

entry.title: benab04/astro3d-core: astro3d-core is a lightweight version of astro3d that lets you create custom visualizations of celestial bodies using your own maps. With no bundled textures or objects, it’s faster and smaller. Supports multiple overlays beyond normal and color maps for detailed, layered surface rendering.
entry.content: astro3d-core is a lightweight version of astro3d that lets you create custom visualizations of celestial bodies using your own maps. With no bundled textures or objects, it’s faster and smaller. Supports multiple overlays beyond normal and color maps for detailed, layered surface rendering.

entry.title: Flotsam3/stockfolio: Stockfolio is a lightweight, responsive web tool designed to support smarter investment decisions. It allows users to create customized stock watchlists, analyze trends, and gain actionable insights using technical and fundamental financial metrics. Built with modern web technologies.
entry.content: Stockfolio is a lightweight, responsive web tool designed to support smarter investment decisions. It allows users to create customized stock watchlists, analyze trends, and gain actionable insights using technical and fundamental financial metrics. Built with modern web technologies.

entry.title: glandjs/events: lightweight event broker for modular EDS architecture.
entry.content: lightweight event broker for modular EDS architecture.

entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
entry.content: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

entry.title: oorrwullie/homebridge-linky: Linky — A lightweight, fast API server for controlling HomeKit devices remotely through Homebridge. Full REST API with secure authentication, dynamic key rotation, health metrics, and future WebSocket support.
entry.content: Linky — A lightweight, fast API server for controlling HomeKit devices remotely through Homebridge. Full REST API with secure authentication, dynamic key rotation, health metrics, and future WebSocket support.

entry.title: MauroBerry/symmetricmorph: High-performance symmetric stream cipher with dynamic masking, cascading feedback, built-in MAC, and chunked encryption support. Lightweight and dependency-free.

entry.title: omarnasr98/LoyalPyME: Open Source digital loyalty program and lightweight CRM platform for PyMEs/SMEs. Features points, tiers, rewards, QR validation, and customer management. Built with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.

entry.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
